problem.p: If the cables are adjusted so that they are perfectly horizontal, what is the force in the cable given that the applied load is 2Newtons (2N)?

choicegroup.label: If the cables are adjusted so that they are perfectly horizontal, what is the force in the cable given that the applied load is 2Newtons (2N)?

div.p: A cable that is perfectly horizontal is not able to support any load. There must be some sag in the cable.
